definition.name: allowed_filetypes
definition.default: png, gif, doc, odt, jpg, jpeg, pdf, png, heic
definition.help: Allowed file types in comma separated format. e.g. pdf,doc,odt
definition.caption: Allowed file types

definition.name: answer_order
definition.help: Present answer options in normal, random or alphabetical order
definition.caption: Answer options order

definition.name: array_filter
definition.help: Enter the code(s) of Multiple choice question(s) (separated by semicolons) to only show the matching answer options in this question.
definition.caption: Array filter

definition.name: array_filter_exclude
definition.help: Enter the code(s) of Multiple choice question(s) (separated by semicolons) to exclude the matching answer options in this question.
definition.caption: Array filter exclusion

definition.name: array_filter_style
definition.help: Specify how array-filtered subquestions should be displayed
definition.caption: Array filter style

definition.name: assessment_value
definition.help: If one of the subquestions is marked then for each marked subquestion this value is added as assessment.
definition.caption: Assessment value

definition.name: category_separator
definition.help: Category separator
definition.caption: Category separator

definition.name: choice_input_columns
definition.help: Relative width of checkbox wrapper element
definition.caption: Choice column width

definition.name: choice_title
definition.help: Replace choice header (default: "Available items")
definition.caption: Choice header

definition.name: commented_checkbox
definition.help: Choose when user can add a comment
definition.caption: Comment only when

definition.name: commented_checkbox_auto
definition.help: Use javascript function to remove text and uncheck checkbox (or use ExpressionScript Engine only).
definition.caption: Remove text or uncheck checkbox automatically

definition.name: cssclass
definition.help: Add additional CSS class(es) for this question. Use a space between multiple CSS class names. You may use expressions - remember this part is static.
definition.caption: CSS class(es)

definition.name: date_format
definition.caption: Date/Time format

definition.name: date_max
definition.help: Maximum date, valide date in any English textual datetime description (YYYY-MM-DD for example). Expression Managed can be used (only with YYYY-MM-DD format) value. For dropdown : only the year is restricted if date use variable not in same page.
definition.caption: Maximum date

definition.name: date_min
definition.help: Minimum date, valide date in YYYY-MM-DD format or any English textual datetime description. Expression Managed can be used (only with YYYY-MM-DD format). For dropdown : only the year is restricted if date use variable not in same page.
definition.caption: Minimum date

definition.name: display_columns
definition.help: The answer options will be distributed across the number of columns set here
definition.caption: Display columns

definition.name: display_rows
definition.help: How many rows to display
definition.caption: Display rows

definition.name: display_type
definition.help: Use button group or radio list
definition.caption: Display type

definition.name: dropdown_dates
definition.help: Use accessible dropdown boxes instead of calendar popup
definition.caption: Display dropdown boxes

definition.name: dropdown_dates_minute_step
definition.help: Minute step interval when using select boxes
definition.caption: Minute step interval

definition.name: dropdown_dates_month_style
definition.help: Change the display style of the month when using select boxes
definition.caption: Month display style

definition.name: dropdown_prefix
definition.help: Accelerator keys for list items
definition.caption: Prefix for list items

definition.name: dropdown_size
definition.help: For list dropdown boxes, show up to this many rows
definition.caption: Height of dropdown

definition.name: em_validation_q
definition.help: Enter a boolean equation to validate the whole question.
definition.caption: Question validation equation

definition.name: em_validation_q_tip
definition.help: This is a hint text that will be shown to the participant describing the question validation equation.
definition.caption: Question validation tip

definition.name: em_validation_sq
definition.help: Enter a boolean equation to validate each subquestion.
definition.caption: Subquestion validation equation

definition.name: em_validation_sq_tip
definition.help: This is a tip shown to the participant describing the subquestion validation equation.
definition.caption: Subquestion validation tip

definition.name: equals_num_value
definition.help: Multiple numeric inputs sum must equal this value
definition.caption: Equals sum value

definition.name: equation
definition.help: Final equation to set in database, defaults to question text.
definition.caption: Equation

definition.name: exclude_all_others
definition.help: Excludes all other options if a certain answer is selected - just enter the answer code(s) separated with a semicolon.
definition.caption: Exclusive option

definition.name: exclude_all_others_auto
definition.help: If the participant marks all options, uncheck all and check the option set in the "Exclusive option" setting
definition.caption: Auto-check exclusive option if all others are checked

definition.name: hidden
definition.help: Hide this question at any time. This is useful for including data using answer prefilling.
definition.caption: Always hide this question

definition.name: hide_tip
definition.help: Hide the tip that is normally shown with a question
definition.caption: Hide tip

definition.name: input_size
definition.help: Set the size of the input or textarea. The input will be displayed approximately this size in width.
definition.caption: Text input box size

definition.name: label_input_columns
definition.help: Relative width of the labels
definition.caption: Label wrapper width

definition.name: location_city
definition.help: Store the city?
definition.caption: Save city

definition.name: location_country
definition.help: Store the country?
definition.caption: Save country

definition.name: location_defaultcoordinates
definition.help: Default coordinates of the map when the page first loads. Format: latitude [space] longtitude
definition.caption: Default position

definition.name: location_mapheight
definition.help: Map height in pixel
definition.caption: Map height

definition.name: location_mapservice
definition.help: Activate this to show a map above the input field where the user can select a location
definition.caption: Use mapping service

definition.name: location_mapwidth
definition.help: Map width in pixel
definition.caption: Map width

definition.name: location_mapzoom
definition.help: Map zoom level
definition.caption: Zoom level

definition.name: location_nodefaultfromip
definition.help: Get the default location using the user's IP address?
definition.caption: IP as default location

definition.name: location_postal
definition.help: Store the postal code?
definition.caption: Save postal code

definition.name: location_state
definition.help: Store the state?
definition.caption: Save state

definition.name: max_answers
definition.help: Limit the number of possible answers
definition.caption: Maximum answers

definition.name: max_filesize
definition.help: The participant cannot upload a single file larger than this size
definition.caption: Maximum file size allowed (in KB)

definition.name: max_num_of_files
definition.help: Maximum number of files that the participant can upload for this question
definition.caption: Max number of files

definition.name: max_num_value
definition.help: Maximum sum value of multiple numeric input
definition.caption: Maximum sum value

definition.name: max_num_value_n
definition.help: Maximum value of the numeric input
definition.caption: Maximum value

definition.name: max_subquestions
definition.help: Limit the number of possible answers fixed by number of columns in database
definition.caption: Maximum columns for answers

definition.name: maximum_chars
definition.help: Maximum characters allowed
definition.caption: Maximum characters

definition.name: min_answers
definition.help: Ensure a minimum number of possible answers (0=No limit)
definition.caption: Minimum answers

definition.name: min_num_of_files
definition.help: Minimum number of files that the participant must upload for this question
definition.caption: Min number of files

definition.name: min_num_value
definition.help: The sum of the multiple numeric inputs must be greater than this value
definition.caption: Minimum sum value

definition.name: min_num_value_n
definition.help: Minimum value of the numeric input
definition.caption: Minimum value

definition.name: num_value_int_only
definition.help: Restrict input to integer values
definition.caption: Integer only

definition.name: numbers_only
definition.help: Allow only numerical input
definition.caption: Numbers only

definition.name: other_comment_mandatory
definition.help:
Make the 'Other:' comment field mandatory when the 'Other:'
                option is active
definition.caption: 'Other:' comment mandatory

definition.name: other_numbers_only
definition.help: Allow only numerical input for 'Other' text
definition.caption: Numbers only for 'Other'

definition.name: other_position
definition.help: Indicates where the 'Other' option should be placed
definition.caption: Position for 'Other:' option

definition.name: other_position_code
definition.help: The code of the answer option after which the 'Other:' option will be placed if the position is set to 'After specific answer option'
definition.caption: Answer code for 'After specific answer option'

definition.name: other_replace_text
definition.help: Replaces the label of the 'Other:' answer option with a custom text
definition.caption: Label for 'Other:' option

definition.name: page_break
definition.help: Insert a page break before this question in printable view.
definition.caption: Insert page break in printable view

definition.name: placeholder
definition.help: A placeholder answer to a question. This will appear in the answer field and disappear when real answer text is entered.
definition.caption: Placeholder answer

definition.name: prefix
definition.help: Add a prefix to the answer field
definition.caption: Answer prefix

definition.name: printable_help
definition.help: In the printable version the condition is being replaced with this explanation text.
definition.caption: Condition help for printable survey

definition.name: public_statistics
definition.help: Show statistics of this question in the public statistics page
definition.caption: Show in public statistics

definition.name: random_group
definition.help: Place questions into a specified randomization group, all questions included in the specified group will appear in a random order
definition.caption: Randomization group name

definition.name: random_order
definition.help: Present subquestions/answer options in random order
definition.caption: Random order

definition.name: rank_title
definition.help: Replace rank header (default: "Your ranking")
definition.caption: Rank header

definition.name: reverse
definition.help: Present answer options in reverse order
definition.caption: Reverse answer order

definition.name: samechoiceheight
definition.help: Force each answer option to have the same height
definition.caption: Same height for all answer options

definition.name: samelistheight
definition.help: Force the choice list and the rank list to have the same height
definition.caption: Same height for lists

definition.name: scale_export
definition.help: Set a specific SPSS export scale type for this question
definition.caption: SPSS export scale type

definition.name: show_comment
definition.help: Is the participant required to give a comment to the uploaded file?
definition.caption: Show comment

definition.name: show_title
definition.help: Is the participant required to give a title to the uploaded file?
definition.caption: Show title

definition.name: showpopups
definition.help: Show an alert if answers exceeds the number of max answers
definition.caption: Show javascript alert

definition.name: slider_accuracy
definition.help: You can use Expression manager, but this must be a number before showing the page else set to 1.
definition.caption: Slider accuracy

definition.name: slider_custom_handle
definition.help: Accepts Font Awesome Unicode characters.
definition.caption: Custom handle Unicode code

definition.name: slider_default
definition.help: Slider start as this value. You can use Expression manager, but this must be a number before showing the page.
definition.caption: Slider initial value

definition.name: slider_default_set
definition.help: When using slider initial value set this value at survey start.
definition.caption: Slider initial value set at start

definition.name: slider_handle
definition.help: Set the handle shape. 'Custom' is defined in CSS using the Font Awesome font.
definition.caption: Handle shape

definition.name: slider_layout
definition.help: Use slider layout
definition.caption: Use slider layout

definition.name: slider_max
definition.help: You can use Expression manager, but this must be a number before showing the page else set to 100. If maximum value is not set, this value is used.
definition.caption: Slider maximum value

definition.name: slider_middlestart
definition.help: The handle is displayed at the middle of the slider except if Slider initial value is set (this will not set the initial value).
definition.caption: Slider starts at the middle position

definition.name: slider_min
definition.help: You can use Expression manager, but this must be a number before showing the page else set to 0. If minimum value is not set, this value is used.
definition.caption: Slider minimum value

definition.name: slider_orientation
definition.help: Set the orientation.
definition.caption: Orientation

definition.name: slider_rating
definition.help: Use slider layout
definition.caption: Use slider layout

definition.name: slider_reset
definition.help: Add a button to reset the slider. If you choose an start value, it reset at start value, else empty the answer.
definition.caption: Allow slider reset

definition.name: slider_reversed
definition.help: Reverses the slider direction and repositions the min/max text accordingly.
definition.caption: Reverse the slider direction

definition.name: slider_separator
definition.help: Answer|Left-slider-text|Right-slider-text separator character
definition.caption: Slider left/right text separator

definition.name: slider_showminmax
definition.help: Display min and max value under the slider
definition.caption: Display slider min and max value

definition.name: statistics_graphtype
definition.help: Select the type of chart to be displayed
definition.caption: Chart type

definition.name: statistics_showgraph
definition.help: Display a chart in the statistics?
definition.caption: Display chart

definition.name: statistics_showmap
definition.help: Show a map in the statistics?
definition.caption: Display map

definition.name: suffix
definition.help: Add a suffix to the answer field
definition.caption: Answer suffix

definition.name: text_input_columns
definition.help: Relative width of the text input wrapper element
definition.caption: Text input box width

definition.name: text_input_width
definition.help: Relative width of the text input wrapper element
definition.caption: Text input box width

definition.name: time_limit
definition.help: Limit time to answer question (in seconds)
definition.caption: Time limit

definition.name: time_limit_action
definition.help: Action to perform when time limit is up
definition.caption: Time limit action

definition.name: time_limit_countdown_message
definition.help: The text message that displays in the countdown timer during the countdown
definition.caption: Time limit countdown message

definition.name: time_limit_disable_next
definition.help: Disable the next button until time limit expires
definition.caption: Time limit disable next

definition.name: time_limit_disable_prev
definition.help: Disable the prev button until the time limit expires
definition.caption: Time limit disable prev

definition.name: time_limit_message
definition.help: The message to display when the time limit has expired (a default message will display if this setting is left blank)
definition.caption: Time limit expiry message

definition.name: time_limit_message_delay
definition.help: Display the 'time limit expiry message' for this many seconds before performing the 'time limit action' (defaults to 1 second if left blank)
definition.caption: Time limit expiry message display time

definition.name: time_limit_message_style
definition.help: CSS style for the 'time limit expiry message'
definition.caption: Time limit message CSS style

definition.name: time_limit_timer_style
definition.help: CSS Style for the message that displays in the countdown timer during the countdown
definition.caption: Time limit timer CSS style

definition.name: time_limit_warning
definition.help: Display a 'time limit warning' when there are this many seconds remaining in the countdown (warning will not display if left blank)
definition.caption: 1st time limit warning message timer

definition.name: time_limit_warning_2
definition.help: Display the 2nd 'time limit warning' when there are this many seconds remaining in the countdown (warning will not display if left blank)
definition.caption: 2nd time limit warning message timer

definition.name: time_limit_warning_2_display_time
definition.help: The 2nd 'time limit warning' will stay visible for this many seconds (will not turn off if this setting is left blank)
definition.caption: 2nd time limit warning message display time

definition.name: time_limit_warning_2_message
definition.help: The 2nd message to display as a 'time limit warning' (a default warning will display if this is left blank)
definition.caption: 2nd time limit warning message

definition.name: time_limit_warning_2_style
definition.help: CSS style used when the 2nd 'time limit warning' message is displayed
definition.caption: 2nd time limit warning CSS style

definition.name: time_limit_warning_display_time
definition.help: The 'time limit warning' will stay visible for this many seconds (will not turn off if this setting is left blank)
definition.caption: 1st time limit warning message display time

definition.name: time_limit_warning_message
definition.help: The message to display as a 'time limit warning' (a default warning will display if this is left blank)
definition.caption: 1st time limit warning message

definition.name: time_limit_warning_style
definition.help: CSS style used when the 'time limit warning' message is displayed
definition.caption: 1st time limit warning CSS style

definition.name: use_dropdown
definition.help: Present dropdown control(s) instead of list of radio buttons
definition.caption: Use dropdown presentation

definition.name: value_range_allows_missing
definition.help: Is no answer (missing) allowed when either 'Equals sum value' or 'Minimum sum value' are set?
definition.caption: Value range allows missing
